body: AMJaco, There was a bug that only affected cases where you have both an analysisPeriod and a conditional statement connected.  I have fixed it in the version on the github and in the attached GH file. Also, the operation you describe can be done with just one psychrometric chart component like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz0ZRG3L32lCfM*Tlo16JKOHkxkzr-tOB5udJRAnR9zh10NX-nO67a2XKzWIXM9185Si6zQYTInDxSIxnwMsRYmj/OnePsychChart.JPG) (see attached GH file for how it works). Cheers, -Chris
